body:
# Simplex

## Introduction

Simplex is a optimization software for linear problems.
It aims to be as much generic as possible to be able to substitute computing algorithms on-demand, **dynamically**.

It is also instructive because of its design principles.

## Problem examples

- Example1
min f(x) = -x1 -x2
s.t. 6x1 + 4x2 <= 24
     3x1 - 2x2 <= 6

- Example2
min f(x) = x1 + x3
s.t. x1 + 2x2 <= 5
     x2 + 2x3 = 6

## Authors and Contributors

* [Alessandro Molari](http://molarialessandro.info)
